products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Sahara pvc blackout white roller blind in white. Made to measure from 10.36 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their sahara pvc blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. 
 
This hard-wearing white pvc roller blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardent and waterproof, perfect for kitchens or bathrooms!
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2155 fabric colour: white material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: pattern match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Sahara White (Moisture Resistant)

products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm
 	fabric composition: pvc

 	guarantee: 12 months

products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Sahara pvc blackout white electric roller blind in white. Made to measure from 145.44 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their sahara pvc blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. 
 
This, chil-safe, hard-wearing, white pvc electric roller blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardant and waterproof. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows
